channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SINUMERIK 808D
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SINUMERIK 808D

item.title: CVE-2021-37199|2024-08-04T01:16:03.969Z -- siemens -- sinumerik%20808d
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINUMERIK 808D (All versions), SINUMERIK 828D (All versions < V4.95). Affected devices don't process correctly certain special crafted packets sent to port 102/tcp, which could allow an attacker to cause a denial-of-service in the device.
